title: Crown Candy Box
desc: The Crown Candy Box is a stylish double-layer rotating storage container designed to organize and serve snacks, candies, nuts, and dry fruits in an elegant way. With its 360Â° rotating base, it allows easy access to all compartments without lifting or moving the box. The transparent textured lid keeps contents fresh and visible, while the spacious multi-section design makes it perfect for gatherings, parties, or daily use. Built with durable, food-safe materials and a modern aesthetic, this candy box doubles as a decorative centerpiece for your table.
